headline: Is Edison International (EIX) the Best Dividend Growth Stock with High Yields?
summary: We recently published a list of the 20 Best Dividend Growth Stocks with High Yields. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Edison International (NYSE:EIX) stands against other best dividend growth stocks.
